ingredients: 1 cup pitted prunes,   +   1/2 cup water, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1   +   1/2 cups white sugar, 1 tablespoon ground allspice, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup buttermilk, 2  eggs, lightly beaten, 1   +   1/2 cups chopped pecans
nutrition: Total Fat 37g 47%, Saturated Fat 5g 25%, Cholesterol 29mg 10%, Sodium 336mg 15%, Total Carbohydrate 73g 27%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 51g, Protein 6g, Vitamin C 1mg 6%, Calcium 69mg 5%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 252mg 5%
